texts.Please define %1$API key%2$ with the fol: Please define %1$API key%2$ with the following permissions "Frontend / Read & write / Isolated".
texts.Go to %1$https://ecommerce.kenzap.cloud/: Go to %1$https://ecommerce.kenzap.cloud/product-list/%2$ecommerce%3$ dashboard to populate menu products.
texts.Pick table number to download the QR-cod: Pick table number to download the QR-code sticker.
texts.After changing table selection setting,: After changing table selection setting, please update your QR-code prints.
texts.Force users to pick up table number upon: Force users to pick up table number upon checkout.
texts.Link table number directly with the QR-c: Link table number directly with the QR-code sticker.
texts.Total number of tables. Each table has i: Total number of tables. Each table has individual QR-code sticker.
texts.Do not ask users for table number upon c: Do not ask users for table number upon checkout.
texts.Click on block above to pick custom colo: Click on block above to pick custom color
texts.Provide one menu category per line. Cate: Provide one menu category per line. Categories are case-sensitive.
texts.To add more translations go to: To add more translations go to
texts.Public link where users can preview your: Public link where users can preview your menu. Ex.: myresto.kenzap.site. For branded link visit
Public link where users can preview your menu. For branded link visit
texts.Maximum number of items per cart. If set: Maximum number of items per cart. If set to 0 cart addition is disabled. Currently
texts.Unite orders into one if table number is: Unite orders into one if table number is the same.
texts.Allow users to cancel newly placed order: Allow users to cancel newly placed orders. Completed orders are not cancelable.
texts.With fast checkout users can skip additi: With fast checkout users can skip additional information entry and sign in.
texts.Ask for table number, additional notes a: Ask for table number, additional notes and force users to sign in when necessary.
texts.Do not force users to sign in or enter a: Do not force users to sign in or enter additional information.
texts.Title: Title
texts.You can track your order from the table: You can track your order from the table below or click on the bell to call waiter.
texts.Thank you for placing your order. You ca: Thank you for placing your order. You can track your order from the table below or click on the bell to call waiter.
texts.Please add products and specify categori: Please add products and specify categories first
texts.leave a note for a kitchen: leave a note for a kitchen
texts.Oops, something went wrong. Please try a: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again.
texts.Oops, something went wrong. Please try c: Oops, something went wrong. Please try checking out again.
texts.Please provide a longer public link: Please provide a longer public link
texts.Please provide at least one menu categor: Please provide at least one menu category
